data.title: Le Couloir du Temps et De la Pierre au Ciel: to movies presenting the story of Tournai
data.meta_description: Le Couloir du Temps, a multimedia spectacle now screened at the Tourist Office, presents the 2,000 years of history in the town of tournai in just 20 minutes.
data.text:
Attractions

Museum or Interpretation Centre

Le Couloir du Temps, a multimedia spectacle now screened at the Tourist Office, presents the 2,000 years of history in the town of tournai in just 20 minutes.

Another movie, De la pierre au ciel, dedicated to Notre-Dame de Tournai cathedral can also be watched there. The document reveals the story of this monument, the details of its Romanesque and gothic architecture as well as parts non accessible to the public.

We do our best to keep you informed. It's best, however, to check the latest news with the attraction you are visiting, or operator you have booked an activity with. Read our travel advice.

This information is given for indication purposes only, best to check with the site you hope to visit before heading there - by phone, email, social media or simply by visiting their website.
